alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 12:48AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chambers, southeastern Liberty and east central Harris Counties through 130 AM CST... At 1248 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beach City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baytown, Liberty, Dayton, Beach City, Mont Belvieu, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Hardin, Kenefick, Cove, Devers, Morgan`s Point, Dayton Lakes and Wallisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
